name: Starace
overview: The planet Alpha One is dying, the Humanoids have to find another planet before all the resources are exhausted and their race is destroyed. The fittest and bravest of the humanoids are sent out to find a new home. The Space Federation, in order to aid their quest, and out their Space Fighters to clear a path through the galaxy. you are a space Fighter patrolling the solar system, destroying or avoiding the hazards of space and marauding aliens. Other problems will face you as you battle through each of the five galaxies.
